workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage PDBs in Oracle Database 21c from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC)

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on PDB management in Oracle Database 21c.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Provision a Pluggable Database (PDB)
tutorials.description: How to provision PDBs in a multitenant CDB from Oracle EMCC.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Remove PDBs from CDB
tutorials.description: How to remove PDBs from CDB using Oracle EMCC.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Plug unplugged PDBs into CDB
tutorials.description: How to plug in an unplugged PDB into the CDB from Oracle EMCC.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Close and open PDBs
tutorials.description: How to administer PDBs in a multitenant CDB from Oracle EMCC.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
